rooms.description: Large open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing east for natural light, adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring clear entrance view.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen, featuring subtle Bohemian decor and ample natural light.
Modern kitchen with an island counter, equipped with floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation and brightness.
Compact utility room located on the ground floor near the service entrance; designed for simplicity while maintaining Bohemian aesthetic touches.
Functional washroom with essential fixtures, ensuring ease of maintenance and adherence to local building norms.

openings.description: Main entry designed in a Bohemian style with decorative arches and natural stone detailing.
Swimming pool area integrated into the landscape design, enclosed by floor-to-ceiling windows to provide panoramic views.
